preqs: Students must have passed one of MKW2402 or MKG2402 and MKW2420 or MKG2420 before undertaking this unit.

rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course type {10, 41, 50}
Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {MKB2402, MKB2420, MKG2402, MKG2420, MKP2700, MKP2701, MKP2720, MKW2402, MKW2420} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}

description: The development of corporate marketing strategies; marketing planning procedure; evaluation and control in marketing planning;  international case studies in corporate marketing planning and strategy; concepts of product management; designing a product strategy; monitoring planning/marketing.
